evidence_extraction:
[
  "The political philosophy of black nationalism only means that the black man should control the politics and the politicians in his own community.",
  "The economic philosophy of black nationalism only means that we should own and operate and control the economy of our community.",
  "His gospel is white nationalism, our gospel is black nationalism.",
  "We have injected ourselves into the civil rights struggle. And we intend to expand it from the level of civil rights to the level of human rights.",
  "All she’s got to do is give the black man in this country everything that’s due him, everything.",
  "Uncle Sam is guilty of violating the human rights of 22 million Afro-Americans",
  "Whenever you got a racial powder keg sitting in your lap, you're in more trouble than if you had an atomic powder keg sitting in your lap. When a racial powder keg goes off, it doesn't care who it knocks out the way. Understand this, it's dangerous.",
  "If you don't see it you're finished. If you don't see it you're going to become involved in some action in which you don't have a chance.",
  "They'll lynch in Texas as quick as they'll lynch you in Mississippi. Only in Texas they lynch you with a Texas accent, in Mississippi they lynch you with a Mississippi accent.",
  "Black nationalism is a self-help philosophy.",
  "But today, this country can become involved in a revolution that won't take bloodshed. All she's got to do is give the black man in this country everything that's due him, everything.",
  "You're the one who has that power. You can keep Johnson in Washington D.C., or you can send him back to his Texas cotton patch.",
  "The white man, the white man is too intelligent to let someone else come and gain control of the economy of his community. But you will let anybody come in and control the economy of your community...",
  "The community in which you spend your money becomes richer and richer, the community out of which you take your money becomes poorer and poorer.",
  "Any time you throw your weight behind a political party that controls two-thirds of the government, and that party can't keep the promise that it made to you during election-time, and you're dumb enough to walk around continuing to identify yourself with that party, you're not only a chump but you're a traitor to your race.",
  "Mr. Moderator, Rev. Cleage, brothers and sisters and friends, and I see some enemies.",
  "The government has failed us. You can't deny that.",
  "You don't have a revolution in which you love your enemy. And you don't have a revolution in which you are begging the system of exploitation to integrate you into it.",
  "we got to unite. We got to work together in unity and harmony. And black nationalism is the key.",
  "It's freedom for everybody or freedom for nobody.",
  "we both got the same objective, we just got different ways of getting’ at it.",
  "The time when white people can come in our community and get us to vote for them so that they can be our political leaders and tell us what to do and what not to do is long gone.",
  "Revolutions overturn systems. Revolutions destroy systems.",
  "I'm not a Republican, nor a Democrat, nor an American – and got sense enough to know it.",
  "The political philosophy of black nationalism only means that the black man should control the politics and the politicians in his own community.",
  "And once you and I go into business, we own and operate at least the businesses in our community. What we will be doing is developing a situation, wherein, we will actually be able to create employment for the people in the community.",
  "So I say in my conclusion, the only way we're going to solve it: we got to unite. We got to work together in unity and harmony. And black nationalism is the key."
]
